about_me.title: About me
about_me.paragraph_zero: In my journey as a web developer and designer, my passion for programming and design is the fuel that drives my constant pursuit of excellence.
about_me.paragraph_one: Innovation is at the core of my work, always seeking new ways to enhance the intersection between programming and design.

tech.title: Technologies
tech.paragraph_zero: In the quest to provide the best user experience, I strive in development, trying to incorporate both usability and aesthetics to deliver better and bolder experiences.
tech.paragraph_one: I use HTML, CSS, Javascript, as well as other tools and frameworks to maximize usability and aesthetics when creating new interfaces.

projects.title: Projects
projects.paragraph_zero: Here, I share some of the projects I've executed as a web developer, while seeking to improve my skills and absorb new technologies.
projects.paragraph_one: Although I don't have previous professional experience, I am committed to gaining knowledge and contributing significantly to projects.

slider.project_message: Learn more about this project at

contact.title: Let’s talk
contact.paragraph_zero: If you have a project in mind or are simply interested in learning more, get in touch, and let's move forward.

error404.title: Oops! Page not found.
error404.paragraph_zero: Unfortunately, the page you are looking for was not found. To continue exploring, return to the homepage.
